Turn Your Ideas Into Reality Without Writing Code

A complete beginner's guide to using ChatAndBuild to create apps, websites, and more - even if you've never coded before.

Get Started View Examples

What is ChatAndBuild?

ChatAndBuild is a revolutionary platform that allows anyone to build web applications, websites, and software through simple conversation. No coding experience required! Just describe what you want to build, and the AI will help you create it step by step.

Why Use ChatAndBuild?

Create exactly what you need with full customization options through simple conversation.

How It Works

1

Describe Your Idea

Start by telling ChatAndBuild what you want to create. Be as specific as possible about the features and functionality you need. For example: "I want to build a recipe sharing website where users can upload recipes, search by ingredients, and save favorites."

2

Refine Through Conversation

ChatAndBuild will ask clarifying questions and suggest features. This conversation helps refine your idea and ensures the final product matches your vision. You can request changes, add features, or ask questions at any point.

3

Watch Your App Take Shape

As you converse with ChatAndBuild, it will create the necessary files, code, and structure for your application. You'll see your idea come to life in real-time with a live preview of your application.

4

Test and Refine

Try out your application as it's being built. If something doesn't work as expected or you want to make changes, simply tell ChatAndBuild what needs to be fixed or added.

5

Deploy Your Creation

When you're happy with your application, ChatAndBuild will help you deploy it to the web so others can use it. You'll get a public URL to share with friends, family, or potential users.

Ready to Build Your First App?

Follow our step-by-step guide to create your first application with ChatAndBuild - no coding experience required!
